original_text: Also, we have all had human fathers who punished us. As a result, we respected them. So think about our Father that our spirits belong to. We must surely obey him, and then he will give us true life. Also, we have all had human fathers who punished us. As a result, we respected them. So think about our Father that our spirits belong to. We must surely obey him, and then he will give us true life.
korean_text: 또 우리 육신의 아버지가 우리를 징계하여도 공경하였거든 하물며 모든 영의 아버지께 더욱 복종하며 살려 하지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Also, we have all had human fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 우리 모두에게는 인간 아버지들이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: As a result, we respected them
and then he will give us true life
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그분이 우리에게 참된 생명을 주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Also, we have all had human fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 우리 모두에게는 인간 아버지들이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: As a result, we respected them
and then he will give us true life
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그분이 우리에게 참된 생명을 주실 것입니다
